title: Range Options
description: Utilities for working with range options, known as ltgt(e), common to [levelup] streams and [abstract-leveldown] iterators.

ltgt.description: Tool belt to find lower or upper bounds, compare and filter keys and more.

level-option-wrap.description: Wrap `ltgt` options with functions. Expose range options without leaking information about your internal key representations.

interval-to-ltgt.description: Convert an interval string to an `ltgt` object. This is the counterpart to [ltgt-to-interval].

ltgt-to-interval.description: Convert an `ltgt` object to an interval string. This is the counterpart to [interval-to-ltgt].

range-emitter.description: Range emitter. Publish keys and subscribe to ranges.
